üõ°Ô∏è Cover Rules (PHB p. 196)

Half Cover +2 AC & DEX Saves

Target has at least half their body obscured by an obstacle (low wall, furniture, creatures, etc.)

Three-Quarters Cover +5 AC & DEX Saves

Target has about three-quarters obscured by an obstacle (portcullis, arrow slit, thick tree trunk)

Total Cover Cannot be targeted

Target is completely concealed by an obstacle. Cannot be targeted directly by attacks or spells.

üí° Quick Tip: Use the ‚ãÆ menu on any combatant to cycle through cover types!

üò´ Exhaustion (PHB p. 291)

1
Disadvantage on Ability Checks
All ability checks (but not attacks or saves) are made with disadvantage.
2
Speed Halved
All movement speeds are halved.
3
Disadvantage on Attacks & Saves
Attack rolls and saving throws are made with disadvantage.
4
HP Maximum Halved
Maximum hit points are reduced by half.
5
Speed Reduced to 0
All movement speeds become 0.
6
DEATH
The creature dies.

‚ö†Ô∏è Common Causes

  • Going 24+ hours without a long rest
  • Failing to eat or drink (starvation/dehydration)
  • Extreme heat or cold without protection
  • Forced march beyond 8 hours
  • Certain spells (Sickening Radiance, etc.)
  • Some monster abilities (Sibriex, Lair actions, etc.)
  • Berserker Barbarian frenzy ending

üíö Recovery

A long rest reduces exhaustion by 1 level, provided the creature has eaten and drunk enough. The Greater Restoration spell also reduces exhaustion by 1 level.
